      • Ring

        public Ring​(double distance,
            double incrementSpeed,
            double width,
            java.lang.String colour,
            Planet parentPlanet)
        Ring Constructor method. Creates a ring of which rotates around a planet as it orbits a star. Must be drawn via the Draw method to be rendered.
        Parameters:
        distance -
        incrementSpeed -
        width -
        colour -
        parentPlanet -

    • Method Detail

      • Draw

        public void Draw​(SolarSystem solSys)
        Draw method for Ring objects. After initialising a large number of small Moon objects, each is drawn per frame. Would be especially better for performance to implement the use of Threads to this process.
        Specified by:
        Draw in interface Body
        Overrides:
        Draw in class Moon
        Parameters:
        solSys - Target SolarSystem object to draw belt to.

      • getWidth

        public double getWidth()
        Getter method of the width value of the planet ring in pixels.
        Returns:
        Double value of Ring object's width.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth​(double width)
        Setter method of the width value of the planet ring in pixels.
        Parameters:
        width - Double value of Ring object's width is to be set to.
